column1: Kôr was the earlier name for the hill Túna.
It is featured prominently in the The Book of Lost Tales 1 as the capital of the Gnomes in Valinor.
In the etymology of Tolkiens earliest languages
column2: the name of the hill of Kôr refers to its roundness. It is derived from Primitive Elvish name Guord from which came Qenya Qora and Gnomish Gwar.
